name: Exit Plan (KratosAI)
description: Your spaceship crashed on Earth. The launch key broke into 4 shards. Humans have these shards  in secure locations. You need to obtain the shards without getting seen and escape from earth. Use WASD/ Arrow keys to move. Avoid guards, find the shard and escape the area. This is our second game jam and we are very excited to see the response. Made with love by Kratos and ConanVegeta. Hope you enjoy it!
